data.content: In nearly 70 years of spaceflight, around 10 000 satellites and rocket parts have reentered Earth's atmosphere. Yet for such an event, we still lack a clear view on what actually happens to a satellite during its fiery last moments. https://t.co/1YHfYpxvAY
